channel.title: PVP Shop Questions - Quickie
channel.description:
I have been looking around and found no tutorials for a PVP shop and PVP Points for PI. I have made a PVP shop but I do not know how to make it so players earn points on a pvp kill and pay pvp points for the items.
If you could please explain below or link me(post here or msg) to a tutorial. That would be great!
Thanks!

item.title: PVP Shop Questions - Quickie
